text: usane kaha, "ai meree qaum ke logon! kya tumane socha? yadi main apane rab ke ek spasht pramaan par hoon aur usane mujhe apanee or se dayaaluta pradaan kee hai, to yadi main usakee avagya karoon to allaah ke muqaabale mein kaun meree sahaayata karega? tum to aur adhik ghaate mein daal dene ke atirikt mere haq mein aur koee abhivrddhi nahin karoge
